data.event: According to the 2010 Census, 83.5% of Bali's population adhered to Balinese Hinduism, followed by 13.4% Muslim, Christianity at 2.5%, and Buddhism 0.5%.

event.title: a significant rise in tourists since the 1980s

data.event: Bali is a popular tourist destination, which has seen a significant rise in tourists since the 1980s.
